subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal will go for his eighth title at Roland Garros after defeating Novak Djokovic in five sets. Nadal will face David Ferrer, who beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga on Friday in straight sets.
snippet: Rafael Nadal will go for his eighth title at Roland Garros after defeating Novak Djokovic in five sets. Nadal will face David Ferrer, who beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga on Friday in straight sets.
